actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to require group health plans and health insurance issuers offering group or individual health insurance coverage to provide benefits for lung cancer screenings for certain individuals without the imposition of cost sharing.
short_title: Katherineâ€™s Lung Cancer Early Detection and Survival Act of 2024

titles.title: Katherineâ€™s Lung Cancer Early Detection and Survival Act of 2024
Katherineâ€™s Lung Cancer Early Detection and Survival Act of 2024

A bill to amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to require group health plans and health insurance issuers offering group or individual health insurance coverage to provide benefits for lung cancer screenings for certain individuals without the imposition of cost sharing.
